name: cable production, data cable in infrastructure | cable, data cable in infrastructure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2268/documentation

This dataset represents 1 meter of a mixture (50:50) of metallic and metal-free glasfibre cable for the transfer of data with a meter-weight of 0.03 resp. 0.079 kg/m. Material data are taken from datasheet of a producer of such cables. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainties.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From reception of metals and non-metal parts at the factory gate.

This module includes material, an estimation of the production efforts (energy, process chemicals, …) and of the infrastructure for the production of an unweighted average of metallic and metal-free data cable, used in structured permis cabling. No information about emissions (air, water) and waste are included.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from one Swiss producer, used as representative for the global situation.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Mix of two types of cable. Data from one producer of such cables.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=GLO
Unweighted average of metallic and metal-free data cable, used in structured permis cabling.

Further references:
Dätwyler (2006b) Product fact sheet: uninet 7080 4P/2x4P F8, Online-Version under: <http://www.daetwyler-cables.com/d/index_lan.htm>.
